title: Update storefront to Preorder and change price to $45

requirements.text: Update the product price from $25 to $45 everywhere it is shown in the UI, including the main product page price display and the Cash App instructions modal amount text.

quotes: Make the product say preorder and make the product 45$

acceptanceCriteria: On the product page, the displayed price reads "$45" (and not "$25").
In the Cash App instructions modal, the displayed payment amount reads "$45" in all places it appears (amount section and any note/reminder text).
No "$25" price text remains visible in the app UI.

requirements.text: Label the product as a preorder on the product page, and ensure any purchase call-to-action messaging reflects that it is a preorder (e.g., button label and/or nearby helper text).

quotes: Make the product say preorder and make the product 45$

acceptanceCriteria: A visible "Preorder" label is shown alongside the product on the main product page (e.g., near the product title).
The primary purchase call-to-action reflects preorder status (e.g., "Preorder" / "Preorder Now" instead of "Buy Now", or equivalent wording).
User-facing preorder wording is in English.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as a single-actor Motoko canister; no backend changes are required for this UI-only update.
Continue using the existing uploaded product images exactly as provided.
nonGoals: Adding direct Cash App integration or any automated payment processing.
Adding a multi-product catalog, cart, inventory, or checkout flow.
Changing product images or generating new product photography.
